I generally like Arai Kei's stories. They usually hold some weight to them, no matter how small. I have a deep disgust for NTR but I can't stop reading them, and this chapter was sweet in a weird weird way mostly because the sensei seemed to be rather respectful and self-aware but the last 2 pages makes me think of every other cliche NTR scenario. 

Now I'm led to believe it's all an act and he'll be sitting there as they fuck with a boner and tears while she rants about how much it hurt to basically be called manly and how the teacher loves her because of it and it's a total mind break ending. Oh, and the 2 will fuck but it won't feel the same as the sensei's. Please let me be wrong Arai Kei. If you decide to stick with the NTR scenario, make it something different.

@rofllcat you're kind of new to these things aren't you? 1) you should re-read the story. your assement of the girl isn't wrong, but you're really looking down on that old fart, you're...well you know what? enjoy chapter  2 when it comes :P
